title.text: RFC 9016: Flow and Service Information Model for Deterministic Networking (DetNet)

contents.text:
User                  Network Operator
        flow/service
 /\      info model    +---+
/  \ <---------------> | X |    management/control
----                   +-+-+       plane entity
                         ^
                         |   configuration
                         |     info model
                  +------------+
                  v      |     |
                 +-+     |     v  network
                 +-+     v    +-+  nodes
                        +-+   +-+
                        +-+
